amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for homeless assistance grants for veterans by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase Homeless Assistance Grants by $5 million, offset by a reduction in funds for the Working Capital Fund account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Clarke (MI).
